description: [Business Wire] - SHANGHAI--(BUSINESSWIRE)-- Sierra Wireless (NASDAQ:SWIR - News) (TSX:SW.TO - News) today announced that mangOH™ Open Hardware for IoT won the GSMA’s Best Mobile Technology Breakthrough – Asia Award at Mobile World Congress Shanghai. From idea, to prototype, to production, mangOH reference designs provide industrial-grade sensor-to-cloud platforms for building wireless IoT solutions. Designs are published under a business-friendly open source license, which allows IoT developers to prototype and test ideas in days instead of months, with minimal investment.
title: Sierra Wireless Wins GSMA Asia Mobile Award for Best Mobile Technology Breakthrough - Asia
